summary: The story of Walter L. Shaw, a telecommunications genius, and his son Walter T. Shaw, a ruthless jewel thief, is a metaphor and a symbol for its time - for the twentieth century and for today.
cast: Howard Abadinsky|Nathanial Barone|Marco Ceritelli|Sylvester Glaser|Yaacov Heller|Linda Honey|Frank Langella|Milton L. Mueller|Greg Ottensmeyer|Dan Riemer|Walter L. Shaw|Walter T. Shaw
title: Genius on Hold
